name: Warrior Woods
description:
This game was made in 2 weeks for the Roguelike Jam. As of right now there is one stage that consists of an arrangement of ten rooms randomly chosen from three presets, three weapons, and one playable character. I plan on adding much more to the game once judging is over. 

KNOWN BUGS:

  • HTML5: Game crashes when trying to switch weapons.
  • HTML5: Game hangs when generating world. Don't worry though, it should only take a few seconds.

Credits:

  • Art: Main background
  • Sound effects: Little Robot Sound Factory, Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch, 
  • Music: Zombies' March, Mushroom Dance, Ale 'n' a Rag
